name: Lava Island: Shooting Action Adventure Platformer
name_original: Lava Island: Shooting Action Adventure Platformer
description:
Lava Island: Shooting Action Adventure Platformer

Enter the world of Lava Island as a young and brave soldier who's mission is to stop Dr Evil from executing his evil plan of causing massive volcanic eruptions throughout the world.

The enemy soldiers will show no mercy so you'll have to shoot when needed, hide, jump, escape in order to reach the next level until you finally put an end to Dr Evil's doing.

You’ll need quick reflexes and be inch-perfect if you want to make it to the end.

You may also download the game from Playstore

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sjgames.lavaisland
